News.headline: Tickets: Gateshead v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.page_title: Tickets: Gateshead v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.URL_keywords: Tickets: Gateshead v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.short_description: Ticket information for the Daggers’ trip to the Gateshead International Stadium on Saturday 4th March, 3:00pm KO
News.description:
Please note that this game will be pay on the day only and there could be segregation for this game, where the away fans will be based in the East Stand along the side of the pitch.

Ticket Prices:
Adults - £15.00
Concessions (65+) - £10.00
16-17 year olds - £8.00
Student - £8.00
Under 16 - £3.00

Disabled/Wheelchair Information:
Disabled/Wheelchair fans will pay the appropriate age category with the carer going free of charge
